packages/file_input/packages/file_input_view/include/plugins/swfupload.cookies.js

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002       Cookie Plug-in
00003       
00004       This plug in automatically gets all the cookies for this site and adds them to the post_params.
00005       Cookies are loaded only on initialization.  The refreshCookies function can be called to update the post_params.
00006       The cookies will override any other post params with the same name.
00007 */
00008 
00009 var SWFUpload;
00010 if (typeof(SWFUpload) === "function") {
00011       SWFUpload.prototype.initSettings = function (oldInitSettings) {
00012             return function () {
00013                   if (typeof(oldInitSettings) === "function") {
00014                         oldInitSettings.call(this);
00015                   }
00016                   
00017                   this.refreshCookies(false);   // The false parameter must be sent since SWFUpload has not initialzed at this point
00018             };
00019       }(SWFUpload.prototype.initSettings);
00020       
00021       // refreshes the post_params and updates SWFUpload.  The sendToFlash parameters is optional and defaults to True
00022       SWFUpload.prototype.refreshCookies = function (sendToFlash) {
00023             if (sendToFlash === undefined) {
00024                   sendToFlash = true;
00025             }
00026             sendToFlash = !!sendToFlash;
00027             
00028             // Get the post_params object
00029             var postParams = this.settings.post_params;
00030             
00031             // Get the cookies
00032             var i, cookieArray = document.cookie.split(';'), caLength = cookieArray.length, c, eqIndex, name, value;
00033             for (i = 0; i < caLength; i++) {
00034                   c = cookieArray[i];
00035                   
00036                   // Left Trim spaces
00037                   while (c.charAt(0) === " ") {
00038                         c = c.substring(1, c.length);
00039                   }
00040                   eqIndex = c.indexOf("=");
00041                   if (eqIndex > 0) {
00042                         name = c.substring(0, eqIndex);
00043                         value = c.substring(eqIndex + 1);
00044                         postParams[name] = value;
00045                   }
00046             }
00047             
00048             if (sendToFlash) {
00049                   this.setPostParams(postParams);
00050             }
00051       };
00052 
00053 }
